derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'relating to the word of God or the Bible'): from medieval Latin theologicalis, from late Latin theologicus, from Greek theologikos, from theologia (see theology)

entry.def: Theology is the study of the nature of God and of religion and religious beliefs.
A theology is a particular set of religious beliefs and ideas.
